channel.title: Redash Database Size Increasing Rapidly
channel.description: We have a Redash instance on the cloud but the size of the database is increasing rapidly. We are trying to know what is causing rapid increase in size and how we can archive data without affecting the Redash application. Please I want to know the effect of archiving data and what tables could likely be causing the rapid increase in size or best practices of handling this

item.title: Redash Database Size Increasing Rapidly
item.dc:creator: john.ubah
item.description:
We have a Redash instance on the cloud but the size of the database is increasing rapidly. We are trying to know what is causing rapid increase in size and how we can archive data without affecting the Redash application. Please I want to know the effect of archiving data and what tables could likely be causing the rapid increase in size or best practices of handling this
